member.name: T:InterfaceMain.LoadReferences
member.summary: Provides utility methods for loading and formatting references, such as TIA versions.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.LoadReferences.InitializeApp(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Initializes the application by loading available TIA versions into the provided list.
member.param: The list to populate with detected TIA version numbers.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.LoadReferences.LoadVersions(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Scans the Siemens Automation root directory for installed TIA Portal versions and adds them to the specified list.
member.param: The list to populate with detected version numbers.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.LoadReferences.ExtractNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the first numeric sequence found in the input string.
member.param: The string to search for a number.
member.returns: The first number found as a string, or an empty string if no number is found.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.LoadReferences.FormatString(System.String)
member.summary: Formats the input string by capitalizing the first letter of each word and concatenating them together.
member.returns: The formatted string, or the original string if it is null or whitespace.

member.name: T:InterfaceMain.MainForms
member.summary: Represents the main Windows Form of the application. Manages UI components, events, and user/admin session states.

member.name: F:InterfaceMain.MainForms.adminConnected
member.summary: Indicates whether an admin user is currently connected.

member.name: F:InterfaceMain.MainForms.returnLogForms
member.summary: Provides access to the logging form for recording actions and events.

member.name: F:InterfaceMain.MainForms.userFunctions
member.summary: List of available functions for a standard user.

member.name: F:InterfaceMain.MainForms.adminFunctions
member.summary: List of available functions for an admin user.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MainForms class.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.LoadColor
member.summary: Loads and applies the color scheme to UI elements.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.MainForms_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the form load event. Initializes references, loads TIA versions, and restores the previous session state.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.MainForms_FormClosed(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the form closed event. Exits the application.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.CbFunction_SelectedIndexChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the function selection change event. Loads and displays the selected function's user control.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.CbTIAVersion_SelectedIndexChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the TIA version selection change event. Updates the application state and restarts if a different version is selected.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.CbTIAVersion_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the TIA version combo box click event. Resets the function group box and disables the function selection.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.UndeveloppIconButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the undevelop menu button click event. Shrinks the menu and adjusts the layout.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.DeveloppIconButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the develop menu button click event. Expands the menu and adjusts the layout.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.ShowMenu
member.summary: Toggles the visibility of menu components and admin controls.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.IconTerminalButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the terminal icon button click event. Displays the logging form.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.LbTitle_MouseDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the mouse down event on the title label for window dragging.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.AgromIcon_MouseDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the mouse down event on the icon for window dragging.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.CloseIconButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the close button click event. Closes the application immediately.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.MaximizeIconButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the maximize button click event. Maximizes the window and updates UI elements.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.CloseFullIconButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the restore button click event. Restores the window to its normal state and updates UI elements.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.MinimizeIconButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the minimize button click event. Minimizes the window.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.RescaleForms
member.summary: Rescales and repositions the form's controls according to the current window size.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.LoginIconButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the login icon button click event. Opens the login form and updates the UI based on authentication result.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.AdminConnected
member.summary: Updates the UI and available functions for an admin connection.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.LogoutIconButton_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the logout icon button click event. Logs out the user and resets UI states.

member.name: M:InterfaceMain.MainForms.UpdateCbFunctions
member.summary: Updates the items in the function combo box based on the user/admin status.
